pullRequest.title: Add ability to configure proxy host and port
pullRequest.bodyText:
proxy.host - proxy host, default value is localhost
proxy.ports - proxy port, default value is 0 (random port)

nodes.bodyText: the valid port range is 0-65535, shouldn't IntegerRange be renamed to PortsRange? (also additional validations should be added)
